lead_paragraph: HERRICK--Rhoda, died peacefully on June 28th at her sister's home in Scarsdale, NY. Rhoda attended Scarsdale High School and Smith College. Rhoda's passion for theater led her to a career of investing in productions both on and off Broadway. Some of her most recent credits included "The Garden of Earthly Delights," "The Gentleman's Guide to Love and Murder," and "Hamilton." A longtime resident of New York City, and Becket, MA, she is survived by her sister Edythe Gladstein, brother Robert Rosenthal, and niece and nephews Gina, Joshua, and John Gladstein. 1/3
